name: NICE_Clinical_Guidelines_Search
description: Search NICE (National Institute for Health and Care Excellence) clinical guidelines and evidence-based recommendations. Provides access to official NICE guidelines covering diagnosis, treatment, and care pathways for various medical conditions.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical topic to search for in NICE guidelines (e.g., 'diabetes', 'hypertension', 'cancer screening')

limit.description: Maximum number of clinical guidelines to return (default: 10)

return_schema.description: List of NICE clinical guidelines and evidence-based recommendations

title.description: Official title of the NICE clinical guideline

url.description: Direct URL to the full NICE guideline on the official website

summary.description: Clinical summary and scope of the guideline

content.description: Cleaned clinical content extracted from the guideline page

type.description: Type of NICE guidance (e.g., NICE Guideline, Quality Standard)

source.description: Source organization (NICE - National Institute for Health and Care Excellence)

is_guideline.description: Indicates if this is an official clinical guideline

name: PubMed_Guidelines_Search
description: Search PubMed for peer-reviewed clinical practice guidelines using NCBI E-utilities. Filters results specifically for guideline and practice guideline publication types. Provides access to high-quality, evidence-based clinical guidelines from medical journals worldwide.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical topic to search for (e.g., 'diabetes', 'hypertension management', 'cancer treatment')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

api_key.description: Optional NCBI API key for higher rate limits. Get your free key at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/account/

guidelines.description: List of clinical practice guidelines from PubMed

journal.description: Journal where the guideline was published

is_guideline.description: Confirms this is a clinical guideline

name: EuropePMC_Guidelines_Search
description: Search Europe PMC for clinical guidelines and evidence-based recommendations. Europe PMC provides free access to a comprehensive archive of life sciences literature, including clinical practice guidelines from international sources.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical topic to search for (e.g., 'diabetes', 'cardiovascular disease', 'mental health')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

guidelines.description: List of clinical guidelines from Europe PMC

journal.description: Journal where the guideline was published

abstract.description: Abstract or summary of the guideline

content.description: Extended clinical content extracted from Europe PMC when available

is_guideline.description: Indicates if this is a clinical guideline

url.description: URL to the article on Europe PMC

name: TRIP_Database_Guidelines_Search
description: Search TRIP Database (Turning Research into Practice) for evidence-based clinical guidelines. TRIP is a specialized clinical search engine that focuses on high-quality evidence-based content, particularly clinical guidelines from reputable sources worldwide.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical question (e.g., 'diabetes management', 'stroke prevention', 'antibiotic therapy')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

search_type.description: Type of content to search for (default: 'guideline'). Options include 'guideline', 'systematic-review', 'evidence-based-synopses'

guidelines.description: List of clinical guidelines from TRIP Database

content.description: Detailed clinical content extracted from the guideline page when available

key_recommendations.description: Extracted key recommendations (title and summary) when available

evidence_strength.description: Strength-of-evidence or grading statements extracted from the guideline

section.description: Reference section for the strength statement

is_guideline.description: Confirms this is a clinical guideline

name: WHO_Guidelines_Search
description: Search WHO (World Health Organization) official clinical guidelines and health recommendations. Provides access to authoritative global health guidelines published by WHO.

query.description: Medical condition, disease, or health topic to search for in WHO guidelines (e.g., 'malaria', 'HIV', 'diabetes', 'tuberculosis')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

title.description: Official title of the WHO guideline

url.description: Direct URL to the WHO guideline publication

is_guideline.description: Indicates this is an official guideline

official.description: Indicates this is an official WHO publication

note.description: Additional notes about the search results (if any)

name: OpenAlex_Guidelines_Search
description: Search for clinical practice guidelines using OpenAlex scholarly database. Provides access to a comprehensive collection of guidelines from various sources worldwide, with citation metrics and institutional affiliations.

query.description: Medical condition or clinical topic to search for guidelines (e.g., 'diabetes management', 'hypertension treatment', 'cancer screening')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

year_from.description: Filter for guidelines published from this year onwards (optional)

year_to.description: Filter for guidelines published up to this year (optional)

guidelines.description: List of clinical practice guidelines from OpenAlex

title.description: Title of the guideline or clinical paper

url.description: URL to access the guideline (DOI or OpenAlex URL)

is_guideline.description: Indicates if the work is likely a clinical guideline

abstract.description: Abstract or summary (first 500 characters if available)

total_count.description: Total number of guidelines in database matching query

returned_count.description: Number of guidelines returned in this response

name: NICE_Guideline_Full_Text
description: Fetch complete full text content from a NICE clinical guideline page. Takes a NICE guideline URL and extracts all sections, recommendations, and complete guideline text. Use this after finding a guideline with NICE_Clinical_Guidelines_Search to get the full content.

url.description: Full URL of the NICE guideline page (e.g., 'https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/ng28'). Must be a valid NICE guideline URL.

return_schema.description: Complete NICE guideline content with full text, sections, and recommendations

metadata.description: Guideline metadata including publication date and guideline code

full_text.description: Complete guideline text with all sections and content

full_text_length.description: Length of full text in characters

recommendations.description: List of specific clinical recommendations (up to 20)

success.description: Whether full text extraction was successful

name: WHO_Guideline_Full_Text
description: Fetch full text content from a WHO (World Health Organization) guideline publication page. Extracts available web content and finds PDF download links. Use this after finding a guideline with WHO_Guidelines_Search to get the full content or PDF link.

url.description: Full URL of the WHO publication page (e.g., 'https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/9789240113879'). Must be a valid WHO publication URL.

return_schema.description: WHO guideline content including overview, main content, and PDF download link

url.description: URL of the WHO publication page

metadata.description: Publication metadata including date and ISBN

overview.description: Overview and description of the guideline

main_content.description: Main content text extracted from the web page

pdf_download_url.description: Direct URL to download the full guideline PDF (if available)

has_pdf.description: Whether a PDF download is available

name: GIN_Guidelines_Search
description: Search Guidelines International Network (GIN) guidelines database. GIN maintains the world's largest database of clinical guidelines with over 6400 guidelines from various organizations worldwide.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical topic to search for in GIN guidelines (e.g., 'diabetes management', 'hypertension treatment', 'cancer screening')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

return_schema.description: List of GIN clinical guidelines from various international organizations

description.description: Description or summary of the guideline

is_guideline.description: Indicates this is a clinical guideline

official.description: Indicates this is an official publication

name: CMA_Guidelines_Search
description: Search Canadian Medical Association (CMA) Infobase guidelines. Contains over 1200 evidence-based clinical practice guidelines developed or endorsed by Canadian healthcare organizations.

query.description: Medical condition, treatment, or clinical topic to search for in CMA guidelines (e.g., 'diabetes management', 'hypertension treatment', 'cancer screening')

limit.description: Maximum number of guidelines to return (default: 10)

return_schema.description: List of CMA Infobase clinical practice guidelines

description.description: Description or summary of the guideline

organization.description: Canadian healthcare organization that developed the guideline

is_guideline.description: Indicates this is a clinical guideline

official.description: Indicates this is an official publication
